poem.title: Coming into Her Estate
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: This one, found in the back of a wardrobe, Scuttles and pings with hat pins, gnomic prynnes And pills for the prig's condition. The silly besom's cracked two crystal Prisms trying to fit them in. Outside under the cork oak, Worth their weight and happy as, Ten Vandal pigs, the colour of kelp.
